pli-tv-bu-vb-pc20:2.1.11: “A lot” renders _bahukaṃ_. This is based on the commentary to Bu Pc 10, [Sp.2.86](): _Sakiṃ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti sacepi sakaladivasaṃ khaṇati, āṇāpakassa ekaṃyeva pācittiyaṃ_, “_Sakiṃ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti_: there is only one offense entailing confession for the one who asks, even if the other digs the entire day.”
